biotools.summary: Primers4clades is a web server that uses phylogenetic trees to design primers to amplify novel sequences from across species using metagenomic DNA or from uncharacterized organisms. Beginning with a set of non-aligned protein coding genes, primers4clades aligns the sequences, computes a neighbor-joining tree and designs lineage specific primers for the user selected species or sequence clusters.
